resources.string: Toggle the Fix for fullscreen video (which breaks halfscreen video)

(1) Samsung Galaxy Nexus -These videos play in the correct ratio.
If you toggle the checkbox, the fullscreen ratio slightly changes and the halfscreen video ratio will be incorrect.

(2) Samsung Galaxy S3 - The fullscreen video ratio is incorrect, but the half screen seems correct.
If you toggle the checkbox, the fullscreen video ratio is correct but the half size ratio is then incorrect.
